subject: Re: Nuplas Staging Site
preview: Hi Jamie,Sure, we have uploaded the "woo-discount-rules" and activated the new plugin. We have also added the css that targets the new plugin (currently commented).The theme files its ready to go. Jus

full_threads.body:
Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have uploaded the "woo-discount-rules" and activated the new plugin. We have also added the css that targets the new plugin (currently commented).
The theme files its ready to go. Just let us know when you guys are ready to switch.

Hi Heath.

Can you please install the new plugin on production site?

If you keep the old one running for now I'll add in the all the new discount rules. When they are ready we can switch them over and remove the old one.

Unless you can isolate them, please hold off on any theme/css changes required until the switch. Does that make sense?



Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek
Thanks Joel!

Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have updated the css for the table. 
https://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/product/8-frame-base-board/

Hi Heath,

Thanks! This all looks pretty good. Just one subtle thing missed - The background on the discount info panel was supposed to be slightly transparent like the cart page. See screenshot attached.




Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Jamie, 

Confirming item 1 is now complete also.

@heath http://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/products/hive-components/10-frame-hive-components/
all done on the first one.

Hi Jamie, 

Just an update on this one items 2 and 3 are done, we are working on item 1 still and it should be ready end of tomorrow. 

We will let you know once it's complete.

Hi Heath/Joel,

On the Staging Site can you please make some presentational changes to the new Woo Discount Rules front end UI?

You'll see an example of the default presentation here: http://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/product/10-frame-shallow-standard-base/

Can we make the following:


  1. Product Listing Page: Can we please apply the same label styling on each item as per the current site?

  2. Product Detail Page: Can we please style the table as per attached design? We'll need to hide the first column.

  3. Cart Page: Can you please remove the label background colour from the discount price on the cart (see screenshot attached)




Thanks for all you support 😀




Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Great, thanks 😀


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Jamie, 

Joel had commented it out from the functions.php file so it won't display. We can activate it again if need be and to match the styles etc in due course.

Hi Heath,

Following on from our call I'm having trouble saving custom style in the theme customiser area. See attached. Can you guys please have a look?

The following css should hide the volume discount. Alternatively you could have a look at recoding the templates accordingly.

We'll need this hidden at the very least, to begin testing this with the client.

Let me know how you go. Thanks for your support 😀

.productinfo-show-discounts-enabled, li.product_discount_enabled .product_thumbnail_wrapper .product_thumbnail a:after { display: none; }




Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

Hi Jamie,

Sure, we have installed and activated the plugin woo discount rules.
https://nuplasapiaristsuppliesau.nuplasgroup.kinsta.com/wp-admin/plugins.php?plugin_status=all

Hi Heath,

Can you please install the following plugin on the staging site for us to test out?

https://wordpress.org/plugins/woo-discount-rules/


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

// M 0423 592 912
// E jamie@makersmarkcreative.com.au
// in linkedin.com/in/jamieshek

@joel can we make sure this is setup :

  • Discourage Search Engines
  • Activate WooCommerce demo mode
  • Disable Dear Inventory connection

All good - let me have a think about what value there is keeping it. I don't like leaving a mess behind that's all.

Would we be able to connect Dear Inventory to your staging site for testing?


Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Hi Jamie,

We are not phased either way on that as we only use our staging server to test etc. It's entirely up to you.

Hi Heath,

Yes - I think that's okay. Would you recommend removing the staging site to avoid any confusion?



Kind regards,

Jamie Shek
Director, Maker's Mark Creative

Hi Jamie, 

Sure, are you ok if we do the staging setup on our server? We have tried previously to push the content from live to staging on the clients server and had DB issues. 

We have commenced to pull down a most recent backup, and will push it to our staging server on your go-ahead.
